name: P7. USERS' CONTROL OVER THEIR OWN USER INFORMATION
paragraph_1: The company should clearly disclose to users what options they have to control the company?s collection, retention and use of their user information.

cells.value: For each type of user information the company collects
For each type of user information the company collects
Does the company clearly disclose that it provides users with options to control how their user information is used for targeted advertising?
Does the company clearly disclose that targeted advertising is off by default?
(For mobile ecosystems) Does the company clearly disclose that it provides users with options to control the device’s geolocation functions?
exclude
exclude
